feed.title: Combined summary - Lightning network implementation with ethereum

entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning network implementation with ethereum
entry.summary: Mahesh is seeking technical guidance related to Ethereum implementation. However, the context provided lacks details. Christian responded to Mahesh's inquiry on the Lightning-dev mailing list, stating that there is no working implementation for Ethereum at present. Raiden network has tried to port a Lightning-like network to Ethereum, but it's unclear what the current status of that project is. The differences in the underlying blockchain make direct porting difficult, although a Lightning-like network is still feasible for Ethereum.
